_sText:
# History

The SuperSolenoid Reactor is an old project developped by DTTCORP research center. Unfortunately due to dissolution the project couldn't have been finished. 42 years later scientist give it a new go by combining this powerful concept with the new technology. The result is stunning. A reactor capable of supplying a whole power armor without instability AND provide a powerful short-range magnetic type weapon by overloading the palladium arc and releasing all it's power at once. 


WARNING : Being in front of the reactor during an energy spike is LETHAL.

The SuperSolenoid first aimed to grant independancy energy-wise. It now fullfil it's first goal and more, is now a weapon.

# For real

I wasn't really sure if I could submit this but Tom seemed ok when I asked one week ago : http://www.gamebanana.com/wips/39243
So it's now an armor for your maps on a mannequin. It can be cool in a technological complex as a showcase of their work etc...

Yeah... I know it may be too different from what you expect but the rules are wide enough to let this pass imo. 

Anyway, I hope you'll like it. I spent more times than usual on this :3

PS : If you find a bug, as always report it to me so I can fix it. Thanks !

PPS : If peoples want I can provide a version mannequin-less.
